help_wifi_advanced.lang_advanced_hwb1: Note: After you have made your changes, click Save Settings to apply your changes.
help_wifi_advanced.lang_advanced_hwb4: Beamforming technology focuses Wi-Fi signal to each device on your network. To benefit from beamforming technology, keep the default, Enabled.
help_wifi_advanced.lang_advanced_hwb5: Note: For more information, refer to the online User Guide at www.linksys.com.
